content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'books' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.books
	(
	 [Book_Id] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ISBN] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ISBN13] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Title] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Author] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Author_l-f] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Additional_Authors] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Average_Rating] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Publisher] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Binding] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Number_of_Pages] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Year_Published] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Original_Publication_Year] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_books
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.books
(Book_Id 1, ISBN 2, ISBN13 3, Title 4, Author 5, "Author_l-f" 6, Additional_Authors 7, Average_Rating 8, Publisher 9, Binding 10, Number_of_Pages 11, Year_Published 12, Original_Publication_Year 13)
FROM 'https://bryanyblob.dfs.core.windows.net/test/output.parquet'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

SELECT * FROM dbo.books
GO
